column2: Hunched and ungroomed; sac'd due to tumor size/ulcerated tumor.
Brain, heart, lungs, kidney, spleen, liver, tumor
Hunched and ungroomed; sac'd due to tumor size/ulcerated tumor.
Tumor was fluid-filled; less than 1/2 of tumor was actual tissue.
Tumor invaded rib cavity and was depressing organs.
2 cryogenics and 1 cell line attempted per tumor.
